about_the_game:
Join the Epic Battles in this most addicting turn-based strategy war-chess game with game play similar to classic Heroes of Might and Magic series.

《Clash of Warlords》 features the zone exploration, turn-based combat system, as well as card collecting aspects, with a throughly developed simulation system, as well as an abundant number of challenging campaigns. The thrilling, mind-challenging gameplay will keep war-chess gamefans gripped for hours. Get ready to enjoy these strategy simulation levels that await you! Let the War begin! Command your heroes to Charge!

Total estimated game hours is about 100～200 depending on how deep you explore them!
